title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 337: ft. Billy Smith
description:
On Episode 337 of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are live in Boston and also joined by Billy Smith. The legendary goalie joined (51:51) to discuss his career, why he didnâ€™t talk to anyone on game days and the Isles dynasty. The boys open up the show talking about the recent live streams from Boston. The guys then give an update on each playoff series. The boys wrap up the show talking golf drama, PLL, plus tons more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
